Package gui

Class FileHandlingHelpers

  • java.lang.Object
    • gui.FileHandlingHelpers
  • public class FileHandlingHelpers
extends java.lang.Object
    Class: FileHandlingHelpers File handling functions designed to accompany a GUI. Includes save, save as, open, and new functionality.

        Parameters:
        textFileName - saved text file
        textArea - JTextArea of the gui component. Used to get text which will be the content of the file.
